explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a white uniform and a white hat "pours" cola from a tablet into a KFC paper cup.

[0-4] The man "pours" cola from a tablet into a KFC paper cup. The scene switches to a cat wearing a colorful striped T-shirt sitting on a chair against a blue background, "pouring" Pepsi from a tablet into a glass. The camera zooms in on the cat with wide eyes and the white caption "I am a magician" above its head.

[4-7] Then, a person in a Spider-Man costume appears in the picture, taking out a bottle of Pepsi and a tablet from the left, revealing the cat's "magic." A red exclamation mark and an angry sign appear to the left of the cat. The person in the Spider-Man costume shows the cola and the tablet to the front in turn. There is a white caption "This is fake" above.

[7-10] Subsequently, the scene switches to a woman in a pink T-shirt and a man in a gray hoodie. The man holds a marker pen and draws a black line on the woman's clothes. Afterward, the man takes the pen away, and the black line disappears. The woman stares at her clothes in surprise with her mouth wide open.

[10-15] After that, the picture cuts back to the gray cat in the colorful striped T-shirt, holding a blue marker pen. It draws a black line on its clothes, covers the line with its paw, and then takes away both the pen and its paw, making the line disappear. The white caption "Pen prints disappear" appears in the middle. Then, Spider-Man snatches the blue marker from the grey cat, a red question mark appears above the cat, and Spider-Man pulls out a black line from the tip of the pen and shows it to the front. Above is the white caption "There is a line in the pen.”

[15-23] Then, the scene changes to a man in a white uniform in a room, pouring Coke into a suspended cup. The picture cuts back to the gray cat in the colorful striped T-shirt pouring orange juice into a suspended disposable paper cup, with the paper moving up and down. The camera zooms in, and a smiling human mouth appears on the cat's mouth. Then Spider-Man snatches the orange juice bottle from the gray cat, revealing a white string tied to the mouth of the bottle and the disposable paper cup, with the white caption "Here is a line" above. The gray cat jumps off the seat from the left and leaves the camera. Only Spider-Man is left in the picture.
